full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title:** Repairs and Maintenance - La Grande IV - Upper Air Station

**Reference Number:** cb-89-35434335
**Solicitation Number:** 5000070017R
**Publication Date:** January 30, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024 at 15:00 hours (see tender documents for closing time zone)

**Description:**

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites tenders for the provision of repair and maintenance services at La Grande IV - Upper Air Station. The contractor will be responsible for performing various maintenance tasks and repairs to the buildings, grounds, and infrastructure, including electrical, plumbing, heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems.

**Service Requirements:**

The contractor must provide labor, tools, and equipment to perform the following tasks:

1. Electrical services: repairs to outlets, switches, lights and fixtures, meters, panels, building wire, fire alarms, hot water tanks, electric baseboards, air conditioner maintenance, circulation pumps, boiler restorations, and power distribution throughout the facility.
2. Plumbing services: repairs to fixtures, drains, hot and cold water lines, water heaters, and other plumbing infrastructure.
3. HVAC services: repairs to the building's HVAC systems, including furnace and air conditioner maintenance, circulation pumps, boilers, and mechanical distribution throughout the facility.
4. Carpentry services: repairs to doors, windows, hardware and locks, and various building components.

**Contract Term:**

The contract is for a period of two years (April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2026) with the option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods. The contractor will be paid in accordance with the terms and conditions of the contract.

**Selection Criteria:**

Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of the technical merit and price of the proposal.

**Bidder Eligibility:**

This tender is open to all eligible bidders. However, preference may be given to Canadian suppliers who meet government procurement regulations.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Heidi Noble at Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca or (289) 348-2015.

**Attachments:**

The tender documents, including this notice, are available on the Canada Buys website at [link]. A paper copy of the tender documents may be obtained from the contact person listed above.
